Articles.Content:
So I was browsing the KSP Reddit and found this post (http://i.imgur.com/uor2U9j.gifv)  and it inspired me to make a skateboard to take to minmus and do a bunch of tricks with..  Yeah, not much, but I've been having a hard time keeping interest in KSP lately :/

Here's the album, I'll make a Mk II with rockets and better controls for rover-ing and trick pulling..  It's frustrating that the "forward" key for rover wheels clashes with maneuvering.

http://imgur.com/a/EQUw1  I don't like embedded albums, it's confusing IMO.

I'll add an album of the MkII version with rockets and a pilot seat later!
You can rebind your rover keys to the translation keys

11 minutes ago, SlabGizor117 said:

So I was browsing the KSP Reddit and found this post (http://i.imgur.com/uor2U9j.gifv)  and it inspired me to make a skateboard to take to minmus and do a bunch of tricks with..  Yeah, not much, but I've been having a hard time keeping interest in KSP lately :/

Here's the album, I'll make a Mk II with rockets and better controls for rover-ing and trick pulling..  It's frustrating that the "forward" key for rover wheels clashes with maneuvering.

http://imgur.com/a/EQUw1  I don't like embedded albums, it's confusing IMO.

I'll add an album of the MkII version with rockets and a pilot seat later!

It looks cool! If you want others to see it easily take this part of the link code: EQUw1 and paste it into the box that opens when you click the little black square with a white [ i ] symbol on the far right of the toolbar.

Yeah...  I said before I don't like embedded albums,  they don't work well and the title and descriptions blend into the white background.  albums on the actual website just look better to me, maybe it's cause I'm used to browsing the reddit opening another tab for all the imgur posts.

4 minutes ago, SlabGizor117 said:

Yeah...  I said before I don't like embedded albums,  they don't work well and the title and descriptions blend into the white background.  albums on the actual website just look better to me, maybe it's cause I'm used to browsing the reddit opening another tab for all the imgur posts.

Mu ha ha ha ha!

 You may not like them but you didn't post this for just you did you? Here is the album folks:

 

Edited February 28, 2016 by Majorjim

NOOOOOO!!!

Ooh, I can?   Sweet!
